杴字的基本解释

杴
xiān
同“锨”。

杴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiān］
［《廣韻》虚嚴切，平嚴，曉。］
亦作“檶1”。
农具名。似锹，而铲较方阔，柄端无短拐。有铁杴、木杴等。用于挖土、筑畦及播撒肥料、抛扬谷物等。

杴字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　杴； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页513第15
〔古文〕?【廣韻】【集韻】?虛嚴切，音薟。【玉篇】鍬屬。【溪蠻藂笑】骨浪猺狫有舞杴，以長柄木杴跳舞，亦有音節。　又【方言】靑、齊呼意所好爲杴。　又【本草】稀蘞草，一名火杴。　又【集韻】丘廉切，音謙。泄水器。

杴字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
杴字的起名意思

暂无。

shovel
Basic explanation of words
shovel
xiān
Same as "shovel".
shovel
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiān］
["Guangyun" is virtual and strict, flat and strict, and Xiao. ]
Also known as "檶1".
Farm tool name. It resembles a shovel, but the shovel is wider and has no short turn at the end of the handle. There are iron, wood and so on. It is used for digging soil, building borders, spreading fertilizers, throwing grains, etc.
shovel
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　杴; Kangxi Strokes: 8; Page Number: Page 513 15
[Ancient text]? [Guangyun] [Jiyun]? Void and strict, sound. 【Jade articles】The genus shovel. [Xi Man Schar laugh] Bone wave 猺狫 has dance 杴, dances with long-handled wooden 杴, and also has syllables.　[Dialects] 靑, Qi Huyi is fond of it.　[Materia Medica] sparse grass, one fire.　[Jiyun] Qiu Lianqie, Yin Qian. Drainer.
